document_data.caption: A map showing the Prowl and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: The Prowl
document_data.mainbody: The '''Prowl''' was a small backalley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Prowl was located in the northern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It ran in between [[Alnether Street]] and the western end of [[Cymbril's Walk]], branching west off the southern end of Alnether Street to loop through a small neighborhood before connecting with Cymbril's Walk.
document_data.History: The alley was named for a nobleman who enjoyed loosing his pet [[panther]]s in the alley to terrorize the neighborhood. The Prowl was also truly haunted. A pair of skeletal hands lurked in the alley, strangling unsuspecting victims from behind four times per year.
